spell_tooltip.description: Summons a totem at your feet that will redirect all harmful spells cast within 34 yards on a nearby party or raid member to itself. Will not redirect area of effect spells. Lasts 3 sec.
Nature's Swiftness summons a totem at your feet for 15 sec that increases the critical effect of damage and healing spells of all nearby allies within 46 yards by 15% for 15 sec.

Summons a totem at your feet for 15 sec.

Whenever enemies within 23 yards of the totem deal direct damage, the totem will deal 100% of the damage dealt back to attacker.
Heals the friendly target for 411,785, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 398,524, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 408,945, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 382,402 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 390,440 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 388,794 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 60% less damage for 12 sec.
Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 260,583 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 106,718 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Lasts 1 hour.

Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Astral Shift reduces damage taken by an additional 20%.
Ghost Wolf removes snares and increases your movement speed by an additional 25% for the first 3 sec. May only occur once every 20 sec.

Increases the movement speed bonus of Ghost Wolf by 10%.

When you have 3 or more totems active, your movement speed is increased by 15%.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Removes all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 60% for 8 sec.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.

Healing from Healing Stream Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 6% for 3 sec.

Healing from Cloudburst Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 3% for 3 sec.
Purify Spirit additionally removes all Curse effects.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Your Healing Surge is 25% more effective on yourself.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 11 yards 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting. Increases movement speed by 20%.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 14,390 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Cloudburst, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, Ancestral Protection, Earthen Wall, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
Wind Rush Totem's movement speed bonus is increased by 10% and now removes snares.
The effects of your weapon and shield imbues are increased by 20%.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.

Your Lava Burst and Riptide casts restore 2,625 mana to you and 4 allies nearest to you within 40 yards.

Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.4 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 345,093 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Totemic Recall by 60 sec.
Restorative waters wash over a friendly target, healing them for 408,309 and an additional 224,060 over 18 sec.
Blanket the target area in healing rains, restoring 291,037 health to up to 5 allies over 10 sec.

Summons a totem at your feet for 10 sec, which pulses every 1.5 sec, healing all party or raid members within 46 yards for 185622.3.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

Casting Riptide grants 2 stacks of Tidal Waves. Tidal Waves reduces the cast time of your next Healing Wave or Chain Heal by 20%, or increases the critical effect chance of your next Healing Surge by 30%.
Targets you heal with Healing Wave, Healing Surge, Chain Heal, or Riptide's initial heal gain 10% increased health for 10 sec.
Your direct heal criticals refund a percentage of your maximum mana: 0.80% from Healing Wave, 0.48% from Healing Surge, Unleash Life, or Riptide, and 0.20% from Chain Heal.
Consuming Tidal Waves has a chance to reduce the cooldown of your Healing Stream, Cloudburst, Healing Tide, Mana Tide, and Poison Cleansing totems by 3.0 sec.
Your critical heals have 215% effectiveness instead of the usual 200%.

Summons a totem at the target location for 6 sec, which reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within 11 yards by 15%. Immediately and every 1 sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed evenly.

Summons a totem at your feet for 18 sec that collects power from all of your healing spells. When the totem expires or dies, the stored power is released, healing all injured allies within 46 yards for 24% of all healing done while it was active, divided evenly among targets.

Casting this spell a second time recalls the totem and releases the healing.
Riptide's initial heal is increased 20% and has a 10% increased critical strike chance.
Reduces the cooldown of Healing Tide Totem by 45 sec.
Spirit Link Totem reduces damage taken by an additional 5%, and it restores 837,426 health to all nearby allies 1 second after it is dropped. Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Healing Tide Totem now additionally grants 80% increased mana regeneration to allies.
Chain Heal bounces an additional time and its healing is increased by 8%.

Unleash elemental forces of Life, healing a friendly target for 347,149 and increasing the effect of your next healing spell.

Riptide, Healing Wave, or Healing Surge: 35% increased healing.

Chain Heal: 15% increased healing and bounces to 1 additional target.

Healing Rain or Downpour: Affects 2 additional targets.

Wellspring: 40% of overhealing done is converted to an absorb effect.
Riptide and Lava Burst have an additional charge.

Summons a totem at the target location for 33 sec. All allies within 23 yards of the totem gain 10% increased health. If an ally dies, the totem will be consumed to allow them to Reincarnate with 20% health and mana.

Cannot reincarnate an ally who dies to massive damage.

Imbue your weapon with the element of Earth for 1 hour. Your Riptide, Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal healing a 20% chance to trigger Earthliving on the target, healing for 160,406 over 6 sec.
Every 4 casts of Riptide also applies Riptide to another friendly target near your Riptide target.

Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 15 sec and immediately healing for 935,958. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.
Every 10 sec, the cast time of your next Chain Heal is reduced by 50%, and jump distance increased by 100%. Maximum of 2 charges.
Earth Shield reduces damage taken by 3% and its healing is increased by up to 150% as its target's health decreases. Maximum benefit is reached below 50% health.
The cooldown of Ascendance is reduced by 60 sec.
Chain Heal's mana cost is reduced by 10% and Chain Heal increases the initial healing of your next Riptide by 75%, stacking up to 2 times.
Earth Shield and Water Shield no longer lose charges and are 115% effective.
Every 1 million mana you spend brings a High Tide, making your next 2 Chain Heals heal for an additional 10% and not reduce with each jump.

Casting Riptide has a 7% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 15 sec and immediately healing for 945,244. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.

Benefiting from Undulation calls an Ancestor to your side for 10 sec.

Casting Unleash Life calls an Ancestor to your side for 16 sec.

Whenever you cast a healing or damaging spell, the Ancestor will cast a similar spell.
Your Ancestors' spells are 25% more powerful.
Ancestors last an additional 4 sec.

Lava Burst gains an additional charge and deals 5% increased damage.

Riptide gains an additional charge and heals for 20% more.
When an Ancestor is called, they reduce the cooldown of Riptide by 3 sec.

Increases your maximum mana by 10%.

Tidal Waves can now stack up to 4 times.
Using spells with a cast time increases the duration of Spiritwalker's Grace and Spiritwalker's Aegis by 1 sec, up to a maximum of 4 sec.
Earth Shield has an additional 3 charges and heals you for 25% more.
Increases the healing done by Healing Wave, Healing Surge, Wellspring, Downpour, and Chain Heal by 25%.

When an Ancestor departs, they cast Hydrobubble on a nearby injured ally.

 Hydrobubble
Surrounds your target in a protective water bubble for 15 sec.

The shield absorbs the next 943,614 incoming damage, but the absorb amount decays fully over its duration.

Your next healing or damaging spell is instant, costs no mana, and deals 10% increased damage and healing.

If you know Nature's Swiftness, it is replaced by Ancestral Swiftness and causes Ancestral Swiftness to call an Ancestor to your side for 10 sec.
